title: Band
medium:
Medium: silk and silver metallic thread (from 1947)
Technique: twill weave (from 1947)
description:
From card catalog (1947)
Band of embroidery in geometrical design work in yellow, orange, blue, purple, black and white silks in stem stitch; ornamental woven border in twill-weave cloth of broad stripes of reddish-brown and blue with narrow stripes of green, blue, yellow and white silk and silver metallic thread

tombstone.epitaph:
Band.Medium: silk and silver metallic thread (from 1947)
Technique: twill weave (from 1947). 1947-20-1.
